onboarding.headline: Never Miss an Event Again
onboarding.description: Capture any event poster, flyer, or ticket with your camera and instantly save it to your calendar

share.title: Cap2Cal - AI Event Capture
share.text: Check out Cap2Cal! Turn any event poster into a calendar entry with AI.
share.appDescription: Easily add events to your calendar from photos!
share.message: Check out this event I found!

valueProp.title: Capture Everything
valueProp.subtitle: Posters, flyers, handwritten notes—if it has a date, we can read it. Just snap a photo.

howItWorks.title: AI-Powered Details
howItWorks.subtitle: We automatically extract titles, dates, times, and locations. No more manual typing.
howItWorks.step1Description: Take a photo or import anything with date information on it
howItWorks.step2Description: AI reads all details and saves the event in your app library
howItWorks.step3Description: Export to calendar, share events, buy tickets, and navigate to locations

bulkAI.title: Instant Bulk Intelligence
bulkAI.subtitle: Scan stacks of flyers at once. Our AI extracts every detail—dates, times, locations—in seconds.

lifestyle.title: Never Miss a Beat
lifestyle.subtitle: Share plans with friends, get timely reminders, and be the one who always knows what's happening.

shareExtension.title: Capture From Anywhere
shareExtension.subtitle: See an event on social media or in your gallery? Use the system share sheet to send it straight to Capture2Calendar.

tickets.title: Buy Tickets Instantly
tickets.subtitle: Never miss out on your favourite events. Find and purchase tickets directly from the app.
tickets.feature1: Search events near you with integrated ticket search
tickets.feature2: Compare prices across multiple vendors instantly
tickets.feature3: Secure checkout — book your spot in seconds

slide1.title: No manual typing needed
slide1.body: One second, almost there. Our AI captures all event details automatically.

slide2.title: Dates, Tickets, Locations
slide2.body: All the event details, extracted and organized. Ready to sync.

slide3.title: Keep the original scan
slide3.body: Your captured images are saved with every event for reference.

slide4.title: Works with all major apps
slide4.body: Export to Apple Calendar, Google Calendar, Outlook, and more with one tap.

freeTrial.title: Ready to Get Started?
freeTrial.bullet3: Access tickets, share events, and navigate
freeTrial.permissionCamera: Camera — so you can snap events
freeTrial.permissionCalendar: Calendar — so we can save your events

getStarted.title: Detect Any Event
getStarted.subtitle: Get the complete picture. Buy tickets, navigate to the venue, and export to your calendar with one tap.
getStarted.bullet3: Access tickets, share events, and navigate
getStarted.permissionCamera: Camera — so you can snap events
getStarted.permissionCalendar: Calendar — so we can save your events

cameraInstruction.title: Scan Events
cameraInstruction.description1: To help us accurately identify your events, please take a photo that clearly shows the date information.
cameraInstruction.description2: This could be a ticket, flyer, or any document containing the event date.

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.description: We're constantly improving Cap2Cal. Your feedback helps us build a better app!

appLikePrompt.title: Are you enjoying Capture2Calendar?
appLikePrompt.description: We'd love to hear your thoughts!

privacyConsent.title: Welcome to Capture2Calendar
privacyConsent.intro: We care about your privacy. Here's what you should know:
privacyConsent.imageProcessingDescription: Photos you capture are sent to Google's Gemini AI to extract event information. Images are not stored on our servers.
privacyConsent.analyticsDescription: We collect anonymous usage data to improve the app. You can disable this anytime in Settings.
privacyConsent.yourRightsDescription: You can export or delete all your data at any time from the Settings screen.

notCaptured.title: Couldn't Capture
notCaptured.generalAdvice: Oops! Couldn't grab all the event details. Try a clearer picture — blurs or missing info can trip us up!

permissionDenied.title: Permission Needed
permissionDenied.cameraAdvice: We can't snap events without camera access. Grant permission in your settings to start capturing.
permissionDenied.calendarAdvice: We can't save events without calendar access. Grant permission in your settings to use this feature.
permissionDenied.photosAdvice: We can't import photos without library access. Grant permission in your settings to use this feature.

upgrade.title: Capture Limit Reached
upgrade.subtitle: You've used all your free captures

paywall.title: Never Miss an Event
paywall.subtitle: You've hit your free limit. Upgrade to capture unlimited events and never miss out!
paywall.benefit1: Unlimited event captures - never hit a limit again
paywall.benefit2: Priority AI processing - get results faster
paywall.benefit3: Advanced event detection - capture complex events
paywall.benefit4: Support indie development - help us build more features
paywall.testimonial: "This app saves me hours every week!" - Sarah, Pro User
paywall.legalText: Subscription auto-renews unless canceled. Cancel anytime in Settings.

settings.title: Settings
settings.analyticsDescription: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage data
settings.exportDataDescription: Export all your events as JSON
settings.clearStorageDescription: Delete all saved events from your device
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete all data and your account
settings.confirmClearStorageMessage: This will delete all saved events from your device. This action cannot be undone.
settings.confirmDeleteAccountMessage: This will permanently delete all your data and your account. This action cannot be undone.
settings.testCrashlyticsDescription: Trigger a test crash to verify crash reporting is working
settings.confirmTestCrashMessage: This will intentionally crash the app to test crash reporting. The app will restart automatically. Continue?

errorBoundary.title: Oops!
errorBoundary.message: Something unexpected happened. Don't worry - your data is safe. We've been notified and will look into this.

phrase1.1: Just a moment, gathering all the details...
phrase1.3: Getting all the info ready for you!

phrase2.1: Hold on, fetching all the goodies...
phrase2.2: I'm on it, getting things ready...
phrase2.4: Let me wrap this up for you...
phrase2.5: Hold tight, final touches coming up!

phrase3.1: Collecting every bit of info I can...
phrase3.2: Just making sure it's perfect for you...

phrase4.1: Give me a second, scanning all options...
phrase4.3: Looking through every detail for you...

phrase5.3: Just making those last few tweaks...
phrase5.5: Almost there, thanks for your patience!

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.section1Body: Thank you for using Capture2Calendar ("we", "us", "our"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have in relation to it.
privacyPage.section2Body: The data controller responsible for your personal information is:
privacyPage.section3Intro: Our app and services are hosted on secure servers. When you use our app, the following technical information may be automatically collected in server log files:
privacyPage.section3Item6: Referrer URL (the page from which you accessed our app)
privacyPage.section3Body: This data is collected for security purposes, to ensure the stability and reliability of our services, and to improve user experience. The legal basis for this processing is our legitimate interest in maintaining a secure and functional service (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).
privacyPage.section6Title: 6. Your Rights as a Data Subject
privacyPage.section6Intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacyPage.section6Right1: Right of Access: You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
privacyPage.section6Right2: Right to Rectification: You can ask us to correct any inaccurate or incomplete data.
privacyPage.section6Right3: Right to Erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal data.
privacyPage.section6Right4: Right to Restriction: You can ask us to restrict the processing of your data in certain circumstances.
privacyPage.section6Right5: Right to Data Portability: You can request your data in a structured, commonly used format.
privacyPage.section6Right6: Right to Object: You can object to the processing of your data based on legitimate interests.
privacyPage.section6Right7: Right to Withdraw Consent: If processing is based on consent, you can withdraw it at any time.
privacyPage.section7Body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
